skins.shipDescription: Conte di Cavour-class battleship ®C Giulio Cesare.
skins.selfIntroduction: Memories that haunt me? None but that dreaded battle. I had to retreat from the Battle of Punto Stilo after taking a single hit... Things would've gone differently, had I only gotten to strike first...!
skins.acquisition: I'm Giulio Cesare, battleship of the Sardegna Empire. Prove to me your talent in commanding a fleet!
skins.login: You're right on time... Naturally. I'll admit your timeliness is the one thing I could learn from.
skins.details: At last I can have a rematch with Warspite on equal terms. I've been waiting for this!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Office work? Cavour is better at it than me... but I'll still do it. As any secretary should.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, be decisive. Hesitation wastes time, and wasted time is gone forever.
skins.secretaryIdle3: A good leader doesn't micromanage or mediate, they issue clear orders and make firm decisions. Isn't that right, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle4: Cavour, don't be so overly formal around the Commander! No one wants to be treated like an old-timer!
skins.secretaryTouch: Mh... Mm? Sorry, I zoned out for a bit... Were you worried about me, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you plan on toying around with me, don't blame me when you get burned.

skins.shipDescription: Both exercise and war are at their core about willpower! Now, get ready, Commander! We're not finished until you're dripping with sweat!
skins.acquisition: Both exercise and war are at their core about willpower! Now, get ready, Commander! We're not finished until you're dripping with sweat!
skins.login: The treadmill is free right now. Do use it if you plan to work out.
skins.details: Want me to make a training plan for you? ... "Cesare's training methods send nutrients to your muscles and away from the brain"? Did Cavour really say that?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Inaction saps the vigor of the mind"... Who said that, again?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Jogging courses, fat-burning courses, rolling hills courses... Is it really this complicated? I'll just start with whichever seems the toughest.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you feel stressed out, just let it all out on that sandbag over there. I can attest that it does wonders for the mood.
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you out of breath already? You've still got a long way to go, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: What was that for?! Don't ignore me, answer!
